description: This file contains the implementation of the ProductService interface, providing CRUD operations for Product entities within a Spring-based backend application.

classes.name: ProductServiceImpl
classes.description: Implementation of ProductService interface providing CRUD operations for Product entities.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new Product entity from the request data, saves it using the repository, and returns a response DTO.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a Product by its ID, throws ResourceNotFoundException if not found, and returns a response DTO.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all Product entities and maps them to response DTOs.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing Product with data from the request and returns the updated response DTO.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a Product by ID if it exists, otherwise throws ResourceNotFoundException.
